title: The author and case of transplanting the Irish into Connaught vindicated, from the unjust aspersions of Col. Richard Laurence. By Vincent Gookin Esquire.
author: Gookin, Vincent, 1616?-1659.
publisher: Printed by A.M. for Simon Miller at the signe of the Starre in St Pauls Church-yard,
notes: A reply to: Lawrence, Richard.  The interest of England in the Irish transplantation, stated.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
